title: List of all Android bluetooth low energy  libraries for use in your project
meta: See collection of all Android bluetooth low energy  libraries, filter by license, modified date, languages, and select best for your usecase.

repoList.name: RxAndroidBle
repoList.description: An Android Bluetooth Low Energy (BLE) Library with RxJava2 interface

repoList.name: Android-Scanner-Compat-Library
repoList.description: A compat library for Bluetooth Low Energy scanning on Android.

repoList.name: AndroidBluetoothLibrary
repoList.description: A Library for easy implementation of Serial Bluetooth Classic and Low Energy on Android. 💙

repoList.name: blessed-android
repoList.description: BLESSED, a Bluetooth Low Energy library for Android

repoList.name: able
repoList.description: Able: Android Bluetooth Low Energy library

repoList.name: bletools
repoList.description: Bluetooth Low Energy Tools and Library for Android

repoList.name: BetterBluetoothLE
repoList.description: Android library with improved Bluetooth Low Energy APIs.

repoList.name: BLEConnector
repoList.description: Little library to simplify Bluetooth Low Energy connections using Android

repoList.name: libble-android
repoList.description: Android library to communicate with BLE Smart Gadgets. Makes life easier to handle Bluetooth Low Energy peripherals.

repoList.name: react-native-easybluetooth-le
repoList.description: A Library for easy implementation of Serial Bluetooth Low Energy on React Native. ⚛
